original_text: You are sent by the king and his seven advisers to inquire about Judah and Jerusalem with regard to the Law of your God, which is in your hand.
korean_text: 너는 네 손에 있는 네 하나님의 율법을 따라 유다와 예루살렘의 형편을 살피기 위하여 왕과 일곱 자문관의 보냄을 받았으니

sentences.original_text: You are sent by the king and his seven advisers
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 왕과 그의 일곱 자문관들에 의해 파견되었습니다

sentences.original_text: to inquire about Judah and Jerusalem
with regard to the Law of your God
